reviews.review: fun to play with freinds. great multiplayer game!
Was really skeptical of this game at first, but after playing with friends I haven't had so much fun in a long time!
Good game and fun with friends. If you want to play comp you have to sit through a lot of unbalanced shit.
Excelente jeugo , aunque tardo mucho en encontrar partida como asesino
